Instance.description: A Crafting SI to Create and Serve an object. This interaction creates the final product as part of the interaction.

Tunable.name: fill_object_actor_name
Tunable.description: Name in Swing of the actor for the object being filled.

Tunable.name: fill_object_xevt_id
Tunable.description: Xevt id for when to apply final states.
